title: ICT 2024 MACRO 09:30 FVG/IFVG (CME)
description: Understanding 09:30 macro concepts and Fair Value Gaps at NY session open.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• 09:30 macro definition (NY session open)
• Fair Value Gap (FVG) formation at session open
• Inverse Fair Value Gap (IFVG)
• Institutional order execution timing
• Macro windows and volatility
• Combining macro timing with FVG

quiz.question: 09:30 macro refers to:
quiz.explanation: 09:30 macro is the New York session open, a key institutional activity window.

quiz.question: FVG represents:
quiz.explanation: FVG is an unfilled price gap that forms due to inefficient price movement.

quiz.question: IFVG forms when:
quiz.explanation: Inverse FVG forms when price gaps and then returns in the opposite direction to fill it.

quiz.question: Macro windows are important because:
quiz.explanation: Macro windows like 09:30 see heavy institutional order execution and volatility.

quiz.question: Combining macro time + FVG increases:
quiz.explanation: Trading FVGs at macro windows significantly increases entry precision and probability.
